title: THIS ONE GAME, Has made me lose hope in this community
body:
It all started when sona was playing badly, lucian started flamming and eventually afks for about 15 min. When he comes back he tryhards, gets a couple of kills. We were leading but the chat just kept going on with shyv and luc flamming each other. I call them "kids" and then lucian sold all his item and stacked up tears thinking he's all alpha tyler1 shit. Shyvana helped the enemy team get baron and the enemy team kept giving him compliments. I've honestly lost hope in this "low elo community", and by that im saying that there's a lot of annoying af kids, trolls and tyler1 wannabes I LIKE TYLER, he's funny af 
and entertaining, but honestly, he's fanbase can sometimes be retarted, kids who think they're all alpha shit by running it down mid makes me cringe.

Shyvana - _Name Removed_
Lucian - _Name Removed_
Please report these trolls and bring justice to this world!

replies.body:
Now that's depressing..

Yeah, sometimes you get one of these nonsense, inevitable. But don't fret, a new match is around the corner.

Remember to report. And move on.

You can always take a break if you have to too.

I like how they removed the names but i can still see the names in the image.

Cheers for the heads up ill make sure to dodge whenever i see those two or report them if they are on the enemy team.
